Title: Where AI Is Right Now: 15 Charts in 15 Minutes
Description:
In today’s episode, we take a rapid-fire tour through 15(ish) charts that capture the current state of artificial intelligence across consumer use, enterprise adoption, agents, and infrastructure. From skyrocketing usage metrics and token consumption to the rise of agentic workflows and the reshaping of corporate org charts, this presentation outlines just how fast AI is accelerating—and how much is already changing under the surface. Recorded live from a major KPMG conference, this episode ends with four key themes from a panel of AI transformation leaders, including why leadership, change management, and rethinking organizational purpose are now at the core of AI strategy.
